snippet: Pat McQuaid has been nominated for a third term as president of cycling’s world governing body, U.C.I., on the condition that he overhauls the organization.
abstract: Pat McQuaid is nominated for third term as president of cycling’s world governing body, known by its French abbreviation UCI, on condition that he overhauls organization, after he and UCI were heavily scrutinized in connection with Lance Armstrong scandal.
lead_paragraph: Pat McQuaid has been nominated for a third term as president of cycling’s world governing body, U.C.I., on the condition that he overhauls the organization.

headline.seo: Pat McQuaid Up for Third Term as International Union Cycling President
headline.main: McQuaid Up for Third Term as International Union Cycling President
